title: Dynamons 10
description: Embark on a brand new Dynamons adventure in Dynamons 10! This online monster collecting game includes two fresh areas to explore; Gold Temple world and the bonus cave. Encounter Tyrexar, Tyceratox, Cobragora, Pterodanox, Knightanyx and the diamond Guardian and many more special Dynamons. Recruit them for your team and beat others in thrilling 1v1 battles with special attacks and power-ups.
instructions: Play the game using touchscreen controls or your mouse. The game consists of spellbinding turn-based battles. You can use the action cards to attack, and catch the opposing creature when it’s weakened. The backpack is filled with items you can collect and use during your journeys. By selecting it during battle, you can access these special items. Use shards to level up your Dynamons, and to gain new action cards. Challenge other trainers and become the strongest Dynamon Captain!

title: Hide And Seek Horror Escape
description: Hide And Seek: Horror Escape is an asymmetric horror escape game. Abandoned schools and haunted hospitals, here's a lot of hidden secrets and treasures are waiting to be discovered. During the game, there are two identities for you to choose, hide or seek?
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Meteoheroes
description: THE PLANET’S SUPERHEROES Fulmen, Nix, Nubess, Pluvia, Thermo and Ventum are six children that one day find out that they have superpowers. Train the skills and superpowers of each MeteoHeroe in the gym with six games of marksmanship, speed, ability, coordination, strength, and synchronization.
instructions: Use your computer mouse to play. For portable devices, use your finger to move.

title: Robocarpoli
description: In Brooms Town, you must solve four amazing adventures: Problems with the pipes: In Brooms Town, a water pipe broke and the road is getting flooded. Help the Rescue Team to solve these situations completing 6 games: • Connect the wires in Jin’s invention • Block the water leaks as soon as possible. • Solve Poli’s maze. • Work in a team with Micky. • Help Roy with the hoses. • Make Bruner as clean as a whistle.
instructions: Follow the instructions given to finish the adventure

title: Hide And Seek Blue Monster
description: Enter a world full of mystery and fun. In Hide And Seek: Blue Monster, you will experience a unique hide-and-seek adventure. The game combines casual games with puzzle challenges. You should keep running away to prevent being caught by the blue monster, and when the blue monster is staring at you, hold stop in front of the fruit, in front of the coke, or front of the water glass, etc.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Battle Of Tank Steel
description: Are you ready to enter the world of tank battles? In Battle of Tank Steel, you’ll drive powerful tanks into intense battles. Experience endless action and shooting fun! This game puts you on a battlefield filled with challenges and strategy. You can unblock various types of tanks, each with unique capabilities and weapons.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Zombie Raft
description: Zombie Raft is a survival game. The zombie apocalypse is coming and it's time for a raft survival game! Protect yourself and other survivors from the looming zombie tsunami, and push them all back, it's your responsibility to survive on the raft! Squeeze the vehicles forward and push them if necessary! Keep going, escape the zombie tsunami, and conquer the barren land! If stranded survivors are found, you need to rescue them! Join us and experience the best zombie game!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Stickman Duo: Escape The Tomb
description: - Stickman Duo: Escape The Tomb is an addictive puzzle game where you have to synchronize two characters. Control both stickmen at the same time and use the buttons to move, push boxes and collect coins to reach the exit in the maze.
instructions: - Move red boy and blue girl by arrows and avoid obstacles. Red boy must avoid the blue water while Blue girl must avoid the red water. - Just tap the button "Change" to change from Blue girl stick to Red boy. - Collect coin as many as possible.

title: SnakeMaxx
description: Dive into thrilling PvP battles or solo runs! Unlock avatars, skins, and boosters to power up your snake in this fast-paced action runner.
instructions: Playing SnakeMaxx is easy and intuitive! -On mobile, simply swipe or drag with one finger to guide your snake through the fast-paced levels. -On a computer, control the snake effortlessly by moving your mouse! Collect power-ups, avoid obstacles, and outmaneuver your opponents in PvP mode or aim for a high score in solo play.

title: Robot Terminator T Rex
description: Ready for an adventure in Robot Terminator T-Rex! Enter the wonderful world where robot dinosaurs and zombies collide in a nervous battle. You'll control a terrifying robotic T-Rex, equipped with powerful weapons and amazing abilities.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Nubik Courier An Open World
description: Become a top pizza delivery expert! Race through city streets, dodge obstacles, and switch between vehicles to deliver pizzas on time. Earn money, upgrade your gear, and master exciting challenges. Fast-paced, fun, and addictive—start delivering now!
instructions: Moving around on the computer using the keyboard. Movement on mobile devices using the appropriate buttons and joystick. Deliver orders to customers and buy new modes of transport with the money you earn!

title: SPRUNKI 3D Escape
description: Sprunki Phase 10 lets players experiment with various musical elements represented by characters, each producing sounds like beats, melodies, or effects. Players create original compositions or follow sequences by combining these elements to unlock special musical bonuses. This edition in the Sprunki series adds new layers, making it a refreshing iteration for fans of the music-mixing genre.
instructions: WASD = Move Mouse = Look around

title: Obby Prison: Craft Escape
description: The game that will test your survival instincts and creativity. Will you be able to escape from prison? Survive and escape!
instructions: Obby Prison: Craft Escape is an exciting survival adventure in which you need to escape from a prison full of dangers. Once behind bars, you find yourself surrounded by vigilant police, other prisoners, and countless traps in the world. Use your skills to navigate through the complex layout of the prison. Avoid police guards, disable security systems to plan your ultimate escape.

title: Granny's Classroom Nightmare
description: Step into the eerie halls of Granny's Classroom Nightmare, a horror survival game that blends the terrifying atmosphere of Granny Horror with the unsettling chill of an abandoned school. Trapped in an old, decaying classroom with Granny as your relentless pursuer, you must uncover hidden clues, solve twisted puzzles, and avoid her watchful gaze to escape. Each room holds a dark secret from a haunted past, and the slightest noise can summon Granny
instructions: Arrow Keys or WASD: Move character Mouse click : Interct Mouse Drag : To move object Left Shift: Crowding Space: Jump I: Open Inventory F: Flashlight P/Esc: Open Settings

title: Epic Mine
description: In the game, you will need to correctly organize the smelting of resources in order to sell everything as profitably as possible. At the same time, it is important not to forget that resources should also be spent on skill upgrades! The game values quick reactions, but the ability to earn well will allow you to overcome any difficult spot in the game with patience and intelligence.
instructions: Your task is to dig to the center of the Earth and save your bearded friends from a terrible disaster. But... wait! What is that lurking in the darkness??? Quickly grab the dynamite!

title: Hero Rabbit Idle Survivor RPG
description: We are rabbits! A fun offline survival shooting RPG game starring a rabbit!Hero Rabbit is an offline game. Players can play games anytime, anywhere without connecting to WiFi and the Internet.
instructions: Upgrade the hero rabbit to complete the survival and adventure game! Game features: - A variety of rabbits can be unlocked and selected, each rabbit has unique attributes, allowing players to meet various challenges - More than 36 kinds of weapons and 100 kinds of props, which can be combined and matched at will - Different maps, different monsters, and different difficulties make players full of challenges. - There are more interesting ways to play for you to discover!

title: Escape the Horror Craft
description: Immerse yourself in a thrilling horror adventure set in the Minecraft universe. A regular, unassuming worker in Minecraft's universe becomes disoriented and has to figure out how to get out of each level and map in order to do the jobs. A Minecraft nightmare comes to life in this eerie, ghostly realm. Stay calm as you navigate the terrain in search of an escape. Is it possible to complete each level without dying? If you're looking for a new game to play, check out kiz10.com.
instructions: Instructions : Move around the map to try to escape in each level before the Minecraft ghosts find you and you can't escape. Controls : WASD to move around the map Spacebar to jump Mouse to move the camera F to interact with items

title: Merry Christmas Stickman
description: Help Stickman escape from jail just in time for the holidays! This time, he’s on his own, relying solely on a mysterious Christmas package filled with special items. Choose carefully to aid his breakout in this festive, story-driven adventure packed with seasonal surprises—can Stickman make it to freedom before the New Year?
instructions: You will find all the successful ways to escape from prison on Christmas Day. Use a computer mouse to control the game. If you have a mobile device, use a stylus or a finger.

title: Around Elbrus
description: In the game “Around Elbrus”, the player controls a character who rushes down Mount Elbrus. The goal of the game is to collect all the coins and overcome various obstacles such as rocks, cliffs and avalanches. The game features beautiful graphics and addictive gameplay and is suitable for players of all ages.
instructions: The player needs to jump over the rocks located on the descent. It is important to try to go fast and perform somersaults for additional acceleration and maneuverability. The main goal of the game is to collect coins scattered along the snowy path.

title: Spiderlox Theme Park Battle
description: Join a creative and action sandbox adventure in Spiderlox Theme Park Battle! You'll play the role of a superhero Spiderman. Explore a huge theme park. Begin an exciting fight. In the game, you will face many enemies. Use your agility and strategy to win.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Friday Night Sprunki
description: Take on the challenge of a rhythm-based rap battle against many famous characters and hit the correct arrow keys in time with the music that starts playful and energetic but takes on a haunting vibe halfway through. Complete every level to beat the other characters and reach the best score on every Friday weekend. Complete all weeks and be part of the memorable and immersive experience.
instructions: Easy to understand; Nice and addictive gameplay; Rhythm-based tap gameplay; 12 Levels with different music; Cute Graphics; Relaxing gameplay, Use the Touch or mouse to click the correct arrows and match the music

title: Palkovil The Way Home
description: Explore the magical world of Palkovil! Battle monsters, solve puzzles, collect toys, and uncover secrets. Feed pets, defeat bosses, and save the New Year in this festive adventure. Dive into quests and bring the Christmas tree home in this exciting online game!
instructions: The main task of this quest is to bring the Christmas tree back home. Do everything so that the aliens can not spoil the holiday. Turn on the lights in the right rooms to move around the laboratory. Fulfill the tasks of the aliens to get toys. Collect the whole collection of unique souvenirs to please your friends with beautiful gifts!

title: Christmas Candy Escape 3D
description: Christmas Candy Escape 3D is a casual puzzle in which you have to fall safely. It is deceptively simple, yet profoundly deep. Play through the extensive stages, sharpening your wits as you have fun. Have a try!
instructions: Slide to move

title: Block Craft 3D School
description: Welcome to Block Craft 3D-School. Here creativity meets adventure! In this pixel-style game, you will enter a world of endless possibilities, like Minecraft. To build and protect your school using blocks of various shapes! But be careful that this isn't just a building game! Enemies hide anywhere and are ready to hit you! Besides, collect and place blocks.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Super Sprunki Clicker
description: Enjoy the Sprunki World in this clicker idle game. Immerse yourself in the beats and music simulation, create the band, and use the rewards to buy new upgrades and features. Break the screen touching the sprunkis, hire automatic clickers, social media features, instruments, and everything to become the Sprunki King.
instructions: Easy to understand; Nice and addictive gameplay; Clicker incremental game difficulty; Progress system; Cute Graphics; Relaxing gameplay, Use the Touch or mouse to click the sprunki and complete the upgrades

title: Stickman Santa
description: In Stickman Santa, Santa’s holiday mission hits a snag when a mischievous stickman makes off with all the presents! Help Santa choose the perfect way to teach the stickman a lesson and reclaim the stolen gifts.
instructions: Use a computer mouse to control the game. If you have a mobile device, use a stylus or a finger.

title: Slender Boy Escape Robbie
description: A tall monster in a white suit is chasing you and your friend. You must escape from the tall monster, either with your friend or alone. You need to be very careful. The forest is dark and full of dangers. Collect the coins you find in the forest and buy costumes for yourself from the store. Together with your friend, carefully make your way to the portal at the end of the forest. Be cautious of the tall monster in the white suit. The danger will increase as it gets closer to you.
instructions: *Use the 'WASD' keys and the 'Arrow keys' to move. *Collect coins in the forest to buy costumes. *Reach the portal safely. *Playable on both mobile and PC.

title: Stickman escapes from prison
description: New prison escape adventures welcome you! Your task is to play as a Stickman and find all the ways to successfully escape from prison. 10 different items to choose from are hidden in a secret place. Some items will lead you to victory, but many other items will lead you to death. Interesting animations and jokes will delight your attention. Check out all the items and enjoy the different situations in the zone.
instructions: Use a computer mouse to control the game. If you have a mobile device, then use a stylus or a finger. To complete the game, you need to click on different objects and find successful ways to escape from prison.

title: Block Mine Fuse TNT
description: Free the world from Herobrine and its creepy buildings. Upgrade and drop TNT, rockets and all your power on cubic settlements.
instructions: Destroy Herobrine's buildings by dropping TNTs on them by parachute, once 90% of the building blocks are destroyed, the level will be passed.

title: Obby Rescue Mission
description: Obby rescue mission is a free online game, a set of missions and levels of this game will test your ability to aim and shoot in fast motion to eliminate all the targets in each level. Little Obby is on a rescue mission of citizens captured by a gang of gangsters in the city and your goal is to rescue and eliminate all these enemies that are in your way.
instructions: Instructions: The character will move around the map and make some movements to be able to position himself better and with your help eliminate the enemies in each level. Controls: Use the mouse left click to shoot Touch the screen on mobile devices to shoot.

title: Zombie Idle Defense
description: Prepare for a zombie showdown in Zombie Idle Defense! In this exciting idle defense game, you will be the last line of defense against wave after wave of zombie attacks! Build your defenses,upgrade your weapons, put your automatic turrets on fire, and fight off the undead!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Stickman vs Zombies: Epic Fight
description: The zombie apocalypse has begun today! Stickman vs Zombies: Epic Fight is an epic stick fighting game with cool effects and combos in the platformer genre. The most epic battles and fights await you in a cube world similar to minecraft, where the red stick fights against zombies, skeleton archers, withers and even Noob! The game is similar to Stick War, Stickman vs Zombies and Stickman Warriors. Hordes of zombies attacked the red stick and his friends!
instructions: Buttons A\D or Arrows - Run. W button or Up Arrow - Jump. Spacebar or Right Arrow - Dash. W Button or Up Arrow or Sword Button - Hit. Press the hit button many times to make a combo. Defeat all enemies and enter the portal to advance to the next level!

title: Dino Simulator City Attack
description: In the year 2024, not only are dinosaurs no longer seen, but they live peacefully with humans in the urban center. Not quite at peace, however! Play as one of several prehistoric dinosaur species in this free 3D game where you may run, crush, demolish, leap, disturb, and do just about everything else you can imagine. Each level has its own set of objectives that you must accomplish in order to access the next. Picking your favorite dinosaur from the list of possible species is also an option.
instructions: Instructions: Take control of your favorite dinosaur and explore the entire map in each level look for the targets before time runs out to complete your missions Controls: WASD to move Spacebar to jump Ctr to Run F to interact

title: Walkers Attack
description: Walkers Attack is an action-adventure game. The end of the world is coming, make your way through a world full of danger and survive! Experience non-stop action with auto-fire and strategic movement. Gather resources, defeat hordes of zombies, and complete missions to unlock new themed levels ranging from sci-fi to medieval and urban. As the levels increase, so does the challenge. Are you ready to embark on a survival adventure? Can you be humanity's last hope? Good luck!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Obby Tower Parkour Climb
description: Dive into the parkour adventure with Obby in the Hell Tower game theme. Climb colored platforms and get to the finished platform for a great reward. The game contains three hell tower maps easy, medium, and hard. Play these maps in two different modes normal mode and challenge mode. Try to do your best timing in challenge mode in either single-player or 2 player game mode. You can also compete against your friend in normal mode in the 2-player game mode option.
instructions: In Single Player Game mode: Move: W,A,S,D or ARROW KEYS Jump: SPACE Sprint: L-SHIFT Camera rotate: MOUSE Zoom in/out: MOUSE SCROLL In 2 Player Game mode: Player 1: Move: W,A,S,D Jump: SPACE Sprint: L-SHIFT Player 2: Move: ARROW KEYS Jump: L Sprint: K

title: Escape Ancient Egypt
description: a 3D puzzle game in the mysterious ruins of the ancient Egypt, on the footsteps of Cleopatra and the pharaohs. Can you escape from the pharaoh's curse? Solve the puzzles and unlock the next room, turn on the brain, you'll need it to open all the doors that will allow you to escape.
instructions: Mouse + left mouse button

title: Hardventure
description: In this colorful 2D game, you play as a little ninja navigating through tricky levels filled with hidden traps. Each world is vibrant and unique, but danger lurks around every corner with collapsing floors, deadly spikes, and bouncing bumpers. Stay sharp and quick on your feet to avoid these unseen hazards and make it through the levels unscathed!
instructions: PC : Arrow Keys / ZQSD / WASD Mobile : Arrow Buttons on the bottom of the screen

title: Turbo Race
description: Get ready to burn rubber in Turbo race, the ultimate racing experience of the fastest and most powerful cars in the world. Whether youre a casual gamer or a hardcore racing enthusiast. Race through a variety of stunning locations, each with its own unique challenges.
instructions: To control the car on a desktop, simply move your mouse cursor to steer the vehicle and keep it on the track. The car responds to the direction of your cursor, so precise movements will help you navigate tight turns and avoid obstacles. On a mobile device

title: Squid Game 3D
description: Engaging Puzzles: Each level offers a unique challenge, whether it’s rhythm-based action, strategic battles, or construction puzzles. Diverse Gameplay: No two levels are the same, keeping players engaged and on their toes. Skill Progression: As you advance, levels become more complex, requiring a blend of quick thinking, strategy, and precise execution.
instructions: On Computer: Interact with objects, solve puzzles, and complete challenges by clicking or dragging items on the screen. Precision and quick reactions are key to mastering each level! On Mobile: Control your character using your fingers. Tap the screen to move your character in the desired direction, and swipe or drag to interact with objects, solve puzzles, and complete various tasks.

title: Wolf Life Simulator
description: Wolf Life Simulator: A Realistic Animal Simulation Game Explore the life of a wolf in Wolf Life Simulator, the most realistic animal simulation game ever! Become a wolf and learn how to survive, hunt, mate, and fight against other predators. Experience the thrill of the wild in this exciting wildlife game. Are you ready for the adventure? Try Wolf Life Simulator now and have fun!
instructions: WASD to Move

title: Cat Life Simulator
description: Experience what it's like to be a cat! - explore open world - hunt different animals - complete quests for different animals and people - upgrade your skills - get rare things for your home - collect food and cook food - help your cat grow up and have a family - raise children and make them stronger - buy items for your home - change the appearance of your cat and the appearance of your family members - get rewards for your achievements - the game supports various controllers and joysticks.
instructions: - WASD or ←↑→↓ to move - Mouse to look around - Left Mouse Button or Ctrl to attack - Space to jump - E to meow/action - Use controller if you have one

title: Stickman Rogue Online
description: Get ready for an exciting stickman adventure! You will enter an exciting survival battlefield.Fight nervous battles against increasing enemies constantly. Collect experience points and progress through endless waves of enemies. Each wave of enemies is more challenging, so be careful to upgrade your skills to survive! Collect energy boosters in battle to upgrade your stickman skills. Increase speed, increase attack or increase defense.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Cute Sheep SkyBlock
description: Two cute sheep must jump from island to island in the sky to escape from the farmers and reach the portal. They need to work together as a team to overcome obstacles. You must help them. Be careful of the obstacles that fall from the ground and sky. The farmers are looking for you, and they want to catch you, so jump over them to escape. If the path is clear, eat all the hay you find. Gather all the hay and safely reach the portal.
instructions: *Move using the "WASD" keys and "Arrow Keys." *You can jump twice in a row. *Safely guide both sheep to the portal. *Playable on both mobile and PC.

title: Stickman Halloween Survive
description: Now that Halloween is here, the gloomiest day of the year, it's time to bring back the courageous white stickman who is an expert at vanquishing monsters. Stop procrastinating and start enjoying Stickman Halloween Survive right now on your preferred mobile device. It's a fun and free online game. Every living thing on Earth is frightened to death when monsters emerge from their underground lairs on Halloween night.
instructions: Instructions: Help the stickman aim his weapon at the right time to shoot the monsters located on different mobile platforms. Controls: Use the mouse to aim and shoot or touch and drag on mobile screens.

title: Monster Dash
description: Sprint, Jump and Blast your way through Monster Dash, an action-packed game by the creators of Jetpack Joyride and Fruit Ninja. Join Barry Steakfries and his iconic Machine Gun Jetpack in a world full of menacing monster mayhem, as you run and gun your way through hordes of zombies, vampires and more with the most explosive and powerful weapons you can find!
instructions: Experience the classic game resurrected from the dead! With simple controls, just two buttons, making it easy-to-learn but hard to master.

title: Penguin Adventure
description: Join the penguin’s adventure in Penguin Adventure! You will play as a penguin who must reach the castle in each level. You will explore three worlds, each with its own challenges and surprises. You will also have to control the penguin’s actions. You will collect stars and hearts along the way, which will affect your score and rewards. You will need enough yellow stars to unlock the next world. Penguin Adventure is a game that will test your reaction and strategy. Don’t miss this fun game!
instructions: On PC Up and Down arrows = jump and move down J = Throw bullets On Mobile Tap buttons = move.

title: Ghostly Graveyard Halloween Special
description: This Halloween, experience the thrill of Ghostly Graveyard is a spooky platformer adventure where you explore a haunted graveyard and unravel its mysteries. Navigate challenging levels, collect coins, and avoid ghostly encounters. Can you solve the graveyard's secrets? A Halloween Special Spooky Puzzle Adventure.
instructions: Arrow keys Or Touch conroller

title: NoobHood HalloweenCraft
description: Noobhood is actually a folk hero. Of course, that's how he is in our game too. He has one main goal: to dress in a Halloween costume, prepare his horse for Halloween, and collect all the Halloween coins. Gather all the Halloween coins. You must be very careful; surviving in this dark and scary forest is truly difficult. There are pumpkin monsters in this forest, and you must defeat them with your sword. Throw your sword at the monsters to defeat them all.
instructions: *Move with the "WASD" keys. *Double jumping is available in the game. *Can be controlled from both mobile and PC. *Press the "P" key to throw the sword and defeat monsters. *Press the "P" key to throw the sword and break doors.

title: Ninja dash Cozy tactic puzzle
description: Get ready to immerse yourself in a tactical puzzle adventure where you'll feel like a stealthy ninja and master strategist! Your mission: clear locations of enemies with a limited number of attacks. Plan your moves carefully and use the environment to your advantage by bouncing off walls and objects to change your trajectory. Plan your tactics, execute perfect maneuvers, and become the ultimate ninja strategist!
instructions: PC: mouse to control the character, AD to rotate the camera. Mobile: on-screen buttons.

title: Town Run
description: Town Run is an excellent option if you enjoy games that require you to run continuously. It combines action-packed gameplay, vibrant graphics, and infinite running! Catching the raccoon is the goal. You'll need to sprint, leap, avoid obstacles, gather cash, and more in order to accomplish that!
instructions: Use the arrow keys to move, jump, and slide.
